div.p: The website is all contained on a Wiki so that anyone can contribute
You can also click the edit button when viewing the website which is located on the bottom of each page.

rich-text-body.p: We have been attacked by spammers so we are running a spam-avoiding scheme. So you have to ask to be added to the editing group of Confluence. This is quick and easy to do.
Just send a quick mail to the giving details of your confluence username and we can grant you the necessary editing karma.

div.p: Note that after you've changed the wiki it is immediately rendered on the http://cwiki.apache.org/ACTIVEMQ/ site so you can test it out; then up to an hour or two later it is updated on the Apache site.
There are a few special pages; for example the page is the left hand navigation bar and the is the top right navigation bar.
